Package schedulemanager.ui

package schedulemanager.ui
User interface layer (Swing-based).

Contains all GUI components:

  • MainWindow - Main application frame
  • FoldersPanel - Folder list and selection
  • TasksPanel - Task list and actions
  • TodayPanel - Today list
  • PlanCalendarPanel - Planned blocks view
  • ActualCalendarPanel - Actual sessions view
  • StatsPanel - Statistics and AI insights
  • Dialogs: TaskDialog, PlanBlockDialog, ActualSessionDialog
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    schedulemanager
    Schedule Manager - Application for time management and task tracking.

    Controller layer - coordinates between UI and services.

    Domain model classes representing core business entities.

    Integration with external systems and APIs.
    schedulemanager.repository
    Data access layer for database operations.
    schedulemanager.service
    Business logic layer (application services).
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActualCalendarPanel
    Panel for displaying and managing actual activity sessions.
    ActualSessionDialog
    Dialog for creating or editing an actual session.
    FoldersPanel
    Panel for displaying and managing task folders in a tree structure.
    MainWindow
    Main application window for Schedule Manager.
    PlanBlockDialog
    Dialog for creating or editing a plan block.
    PlanCalendarPanel
    Panel for displaying and managing plan blocks (planned time blocks).
    StatsPanel
    Panel for displaying statistics and AI insights.
    TaskDialog
    Dialog for creating or editing a task.
    TasksPanel
    Panel for displaying and managing tasks in the selected folder.
    TodayPanel
    Panel for displaying and managing the Today list (tasks selected for today).
